original_title: Pioneers of the Cinema: The Herstory
overview: There were more women working in influential positions behind the scenes in film before 1920 than at any other time in history. Filmmaker, author, nationwide lecturer Ally Acker, takes us on an archival journey of the pioneering female filmmakers who have transformed the way we look at movies from 1896 to the present.
title: Pioneers of the Cinema: The Herstory
